item.title: Iteration
item.description: from The Computing Zone To be successful Follow this link to hand in your files. You will need to save each of the tasks in this set in its own file, with a simple naming system: 13. Lines cheat should be in a file named ex13.py, 14. Cricket over should be in a file named ex14.py and so on. You will be submitting these files to a system which will mark them automatically.
